docs.snippet: Former and current employees of the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency expressed opposition to President Donald Trump's pick to run the agency on Monday - in an open letter and a small street protest - reflecting divisions over the new administr...
docs.lead_paragraph: Former and current employees of the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency expressed opposition to President Donald Trump's pick to run the agency on Monday - in an open letter and a small street protest - reflecting divisions over the new administration's plans to slash regulation.

headline.main: U.S. EPA Employees Protest Trump's Pick to Run Agency
headline.print_headline: U.S. EPA Employees Protest Trump's Pick to Run Agency
